entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 3:47AM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...PATCHY DENSE FOG WILL AFFECT TRAVEL OVER FAR EASTERN ILLINOIS EARLY THIS MORNING... Patchy dense fog has formed across far eastern Illinois in the last couple of hours. entry.title: Red Flag Warning issued September 20 at 3:00AM PDT until September 20 at 7:00PM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Gusty north winds and dry conditions Tuesday... .North winds will increase down the Okanogan Valley Tuesday. Strong winds will be coupled with dry conditions Tuesday afternoon into the early evening increasing the potential for rapid spread of any new fires. Winds will peak in the early afternoon and decrease early Tuesday evening.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Okanogan Valley
